person.persName: Charles Riddle (Brown County, IL, laborer and murderer)

body.p: Brown County, Illinois, laborer and prisoner. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Riddle. Father of Charles Riddle, Mary E. Riddle, Dicy A. Riddle, and James Riddle. Laborer in Brown County, Illinois, in 1850. Indicted for the murder of Jonah Clark in Brown County in May 1860. Imprisoned in Cooperstown in 1860.
